alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 5:18PM EDT until July 11 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Monroe County in southeastern Michigan... Northeastern Lenawee County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 518 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Britton, or near Tecumseh, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Milan around 530 PM EDT. Dundee and Petersburg around 540 PM EDT. Maybee around 550 PM EDT. Ida around 555 PM EDT. Monroe around 610 PM EDT. Luna Pier around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Newport, Cone, Macon, Estral Beach, Toledo Beach, Erie, Woodland Beach, Stony Point, Ridgeway and Bolles Harbor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
